title: Riot, making Poppy a snaggletooth when you reworked her was a great idea

replies.body: I like how she's more determined to succeed despite constantly failing from her point of view. I admire the ability to just accept a mistake and move on.

Her character is really nice, most champions know their power and their potential, but she doesn't, she thinks she's just a regular girl with a hammer. I think she shares that with Taliyah, Taliyah doesn't think of herself as extraordinary either.

The main difference is that Taliyah knows she has power and is terrified of it. Poppy is oblivious. 

Either Poppy is pretty thick or she's so used to seeing the stuff she does that it doesn't even register as amazing anymore. Makes you wonder how powerful Orlorn was.
I think Orlorn could have gone toe-to-toe with a Darkin.

Nightfall vs. Orlon's Hammer

My money's on the soul crushing Metal instrument of destruction
I think the fact that Orlorn's hammer can create Saitama-like damage, Mordekaiser's in over his head.

But he's living
Flesh>Metal

He's wearing metal, and his abs can shatter steel.

Abs>metal

But Morde got cookies

Cookies>Abs

The hammer can knock Morde up.

*{{champion:37}} approves*
...shit, that's good.
The hammer ain't alive.

And who are you to assume that?!
It has feelings too!
Ok, correction: the hammer ain't made of flesh.
_Yet_
What the fuck
Orlorn's Hammer can't melt Malicious Metal.

I think she's used to it and thinks of the amazing stuff she does as normal. I doubt she's thick, however she might be blinded by how low she thinks of herself. Which, in itself, is a form of stupidity.

Yeah. Or she knows it but doesn't have the confidence to accept it. So she's subconsciously ignorant of it. 

I think I worded that right. Either way that gives me an idea for a fic.
You need to send it to me once you've finished it. I'd love reading a Poppy fic.

I agree, as a prework Poppy player, I find Poppy much more enjoyable with her (Mostly, they removed blomgrun) improved lore, improved gameplay, improved model, art, less broken abilities, and voice that didn't make me want to make my kill myself.

Why do we need champions to be "cute?"

Poppy's appeal was in how unappealing she was, yes her play rate reflected this, but that was fine with me and the few others who dared to play her.

What's next, a Debonair Urgot skin, and then suddenly making every other Urgot skin unavailable?

There's a niche for people who like things that aren't in the mainstream or aren't aesthetically pleasing, Riot apparently doesn't care to cater to this niche.

Because all champions, specifically all human female champions need a big pair of jubbly titties and a small petite nose and love heart lips. 
If they're female, but not human they HAVE to be adorable and cute. 
How dare you.
